page.title: 12CLUBS IN CARLTON
page.content: In our{block}there is {3}Villages {Carton_in_Lindrick,Letwell}and { {Wallingwells. Letwell}is a small village.In{Letwell}there is a dog training club in the Church Hall. In{Carlton_in_Lindrick}there are a lot of clubs.There are Cubs and Scouts and they have their own hall. Scouts meet once a week which is on Friday.The camps are good they are exciting sometimes they go canoeing and on hikes.Rondos are good because you learn things like how to do pioneering and light fires.Sometimes they go up to the woods to cook food. There are also some more clubs in {Carlton-in-Lindrick.}There is a Girl Guides,Boys Brigade and Brownies at Wigthorpe Hall.There is a new youth club in Costhorpe but it is called {Carlton Youth Center.
